dc_description_s: This datalayer is a polygon coverage for Massachusetts towns which displays tabular data on housing unit occupancy, ownership status, median age of structures as well as vehicles associated with different types of housing or living quarters. For more information on the terms and definitions used for these attributes, please read the 'Supplemental Information' section below. This layer was derived from the Massachusetts Electronic Atlas database published by the Harvard Map Collection in 2001. The Massachusetts Electronic Atlas (MEA) was a collaborative project to provides access, via the Internet, to data about the Commonwealth, its thirteen regional planning agency districts and 351 cities and towns. This dataset is now only available via The Harvard Geospatial Library.
dc_creator_sm: U.S. Department of Commerce, Bureau of the Census
Massachusetts Institute for Social and Economic Research, University of Massachusetts
Massachusetts Office of Geographic and Environmental Information (MassGIS)
